EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.11, User Session Stores for Cloud-Native Apps, Operationalize IoT Apps for Pivotal Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
june 7, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.11—CredHub, Container Networking & Spring Boot Actuator Jared Ruckle and Pieter Humphrey, pivotal July 19, 2017 11:00am PDT / 2:00Pm EDT
Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.11 is now generally available. Join Jared Ruckle and Pieter Humphrey for a deeper look at new capabilities, along with a Q&A about many of the new product features.
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jul-19-pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-11-credhub-container-networking-spring-boot-actuator-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-digest&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pcf-1.11-ruckle-humphrey_q317]]>
Deliver Performant & Highly Available User Session Stores for Cloud-Native Apps Kamala Dasika, Pivotal and Roshan Kumar, Redis Labs July 26, 2017 11:00am PDT / 2:00pm EDT
If you’re looking to quickly build or modernize apps that need a highly responsive and available database like Redis, this session brought to you by Pivotal and Redis Labs may be of interest. Discussion will cover real-time use cases, HA and DR capabilities, and how to manage Redis Enterprise via Pivotal Cloud Foundry to enable a high performance deployment and dynamic scaling.
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jul-26-deliver-performant-highly-available-user-session-stores-for-cloud-native-apps-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-digest&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=redis-session-stores_q317]]>
Learn How to Operationalize IoT Apps on Pivotal Cloud Foundry Chris Rawles and Jeff Kelly, Pivotal august 15, 2017 11:00am PDT / 2:00pm EDT
Join this session with Pivotal Data Scientist Chris Rawles to learn how to build and operationalize an Internet of Things application running on Pivotal Cloud Foundry that scores and reacts to streaming data in real-time.
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/aug-15-learn-how-to-operationalize-iot-apps-on-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-digest&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=operationalize-iot-apps-jk-q317]]>
